page.title: 11VILLAGE BORN AND BRED(2)
page.content: We had a big partition to divide the old school into two rooms for Juniors,Seniors and Infants. We had an entrance door for girls and one for boys.We had to go home for dinners,there were no school dinners then.We went to that school until we left school at 14. My mother was a land girl in the wartime and then she kept chickens for breeding.People who wanted to rear chickens would come and buy a dozen eggs from her.I have always loved animals and one of my other jobs is looking after other peoples dogs when they go away. My main interest is football.I've always loved football and supported the village teams.
